abstract: Toyota announced Wednesday that 50,000 Sequoia sport utility vehicles made in 2003 will be upgraded.
snippet: Toyota announced Wednesday that 50,000 Sequoia sport utility vehicles made in 2003 will be upgraded.
lead_paragraph: Toyota announced a second recall Wednesday related to the vehicle stability control system on its sport utility vehicles, this one concerning the 2003 model year Sequoia.

headline.print_headline: Toyota Announces Another Recall Over Stability Control in Some S.U.V.’s

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
